content: ~16 ending with row 4 3 join mc and repeat color change section with cc2 and mc joining use kitchener stitch to join in the round https //drive google com/open id=0b1zbtvd8fas3u2dkywpqa25wzxc blocking weave in all ends and soak lay flat and pin out to 10 inches wide the scarf will stretch after blocking making the final width ~ 7 inches skill level intermediate www assortedmusings com ©assorted musings knit & co chart lace pattern mc=36 cc1 & cc2= 21 notes  ws increases are kfb  ws decreases are ssk  = repeat this section  refer to written instructions for the color change sections
